WorkItem.Description:
An example of a WF workflow that sleep for a few seconds (or minutes) and when wake up, do anything like create a XML file, insert a record on a database or anything like this.
 
with this example we have an example of a workflow that exists for long time and can wake up and do some work and go back to sleep.
 
regards
Paulo Aboim Pinto
Odivelas - Portugal
WorkItem.Summary: Host Workflow on IIS that is delay on time
